body.name: SAMSUNG 30” - 100” The Freestyle 2nd Gen with Gaming Hub Smart Portable Projector, FHD, HDR, Big Screen Home Theater Experience, 360 Sound, SP-LFF3CLAXXZA, 2023 Model
body.merchantInfo: Ships from and sold by Hatchfields Co..
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 9 hrs 8 mins.
features: POINT & PLAY: Pick a spot, place it, tilt it and watch content come to life with the smart theater that makes it simple; The cradle stand gives you floor-to-ceiling flexibility with a rotation of 180 degrees - always giving you the best view*

EASY SET UP: Let The Freestyle 2nd Gen with Gaming Hub do the work with its Auto Leveling, Auto Focus and Auto Keystone technology that adjusts your picture for the best view possible; No fussing with settings—just sit back and enjoy the show**
SMART ENTERTAINMENT: Access everything; All your apps, workouts, recipes and shows in one portable smart theater*; It's got your content covered with the streaming services you love***

GAMING HUB: Where gaming comes together bringing the best of console games, streaming games and more; With easier access to your favorite games, standalone apps & accessories, start playing faster and get recommendations for other games****

360 SOUND: Immersive sounds with 360-degree audio from The Freestyle 2nd Gen with Gaming Hub; High quality speakers ensure an earful; Bring the noise even more when you connect a Bluetooth speaker, Samsung Sound Tower or Soundbar

EXTERNAL BATTERY COMPATIBLE: Pair The Freestyle 2nd Gen with Gaming Hub with your personal portable battery*****; Connect a USB-C type compatible battery for instant use and charge it with a C-type charger for indoor or outdoor use

SCALE & MOVE SCREEN: No need to move your image around; When wall or surface isn’t quite right, this smart theater-to-go makes it easy to shrink down the image, move it around and project from 100 to 30 inches; Your picture will always stay level

MULTIPLE VOICE ASSISTANTS: Find all your favorite shows, turn up the volume and take control of your connected devices—all by using the Voice Assistant that’s built in to the projector; Everyday viewing isn’t just entertaining, it’s also easy

FHD: Jump to a new dimension with Full High Definition. With 1920x1080 resolution, you can sit up closer than with HD, making everything larger, crisper and clearer. Games become grander, movies more magical and sports more sensational with this full HD quality.*

SMART CALIBRATION: Cinema quality screen enhancement right from your phone; For an instant upgrade, use the all in-one image optimization solution for cinematic quality with ideal color, exposure, contrast in tones in less than 12 minutes******
body.description: Be ready when the big screen beckons. Bring the action with The Freestyle 2nd Gen with Gaming Hub, a smart theater you can take to go. Booming 360° sound turns any seat into the best seat with the best view. It automatically brings you the best experience at any size while adjusting focus, keystone and leveling—all so you can make motion picture magic in minutes.*** *Includes Samsung SmartHub by Wi-Fi; additional external content by Micro HDMI port (adapter/cables not included) and compatible devices with Apple AirPlay 2, SmartThings’ Tap View. **Watching projector for an extended period of time causes the panel to generate heat, which is released through the vents on the Projector. ***Content and services are subject to change. ****Internet connection, additional gaming service subscription and compatible controller required. *****Sold separately. ******Compatible with Galaxy models released after January 2019, S, Note, Fold, Z Flip model. iPhone products released after January 2019 and with Face ID function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Relatively simple setup. It auto-adjusts seamlessly. When we first turned it one we just pointed it straight up at the ceiling. Our textured walls and ceiling are white but smooth enough that any blank space becomes a backdrop for it. We bought a screen, but the walls actually seem to work better. Super portable. We move it around constantly and it quickly recalibrates for color, angle, etc.Once it's on your wifi you've got instant access to tons of tv- it's like having an old school cable box built in. Bright enough that you probably should not use 100% brightness level at night for eye health, but like all projectors, it doesn't work well if there's much ambient light. It won't work outdoors while the sun is up.The audio is even pretty great- good enough that we don't feel the need to connect Bluetooth speakers when we move it around. There's a fan that makes a faint whirring noise. I dropped it hard right as I opened the package, but the little fella seems pretty durable so far. I haven't tried gaming on it yet, if I do I may send an update. So far it's exceeded my expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My cat love it
reviews.reviewText: It's a very small and portable projector that's good for a small apartment like ours. As soon we turned it on our cat tried to play with the projected light.The main thing that got to me was the loudness and bass of the speaker is really good and great if you're hosting and it's on your coffee table. It really shines when it's darker or when the sun sets and you can tell it's very good quality. It isn't too good for the daytime. The fan is audibly present when on but not noticeable when watching things. When gaming on it there isn't much of a buffer as well. The thing that got me was that you can Bluetooth connect to this thing to stream and it's super user friendly! You don't have to have all these other apps for stuff you just watch straight away out of the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor image quality
reviews.reviewText: I have been all about Samsung products but this projector is certainly a big disappointment. The design is great and portable but the brightness is so bad that it's almost impossible to use anythingexcept pitch dark. I wouldn't even recommend buying at $300 price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MAYBE THE BEST
reviews.reviewText: I've used multiple projectors. For the money, this might be the best option. Especially if you use a samsung phone. It will autofocus to any surface while maintaining a crystal clear image. I've used it for movies, sketching outlines, a speaker, and other things. It does it all and can control it all from your phone.TO RECAP: a fantastic option for the price if you want an all in one, app included, compact projector

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very good image and sound quality, menu controls don’t help to adjust/laggy controls
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased projectors and screens previously and most had bad audio, questionable image quality and were themselves too loud. This projector has great audio and makes almost no noise from the fan but I chose this one because the auto keystone feature since I have limited placement options in a newly rehabbed area of the basement I wanted to make a cinema room (but still have the ability to move screen out of the way to just have decorated wall).The image quality is very good even at 90%. I purchased a 100” screen for the exterior stone wall and from 12’ away the projector looks best around 85% for my size but works well at 90%. Over 7 foot wide image!The preset apps for streaming and live tv give me everything I have on my Samsung tv and controlling it with the remote (solar, but would be nice IF usbC charging cable was included). It connected fine to my iPhone to control the projector as well as share screen. I also purchased a micro hdmi cable to connect my MacBook to screen without issue. I haven’t moved a gaming system down yet but assume it will work fine with the micro cable.The image quality is very good for a projector in this price point. It’s bright AS LONG AS you can control ambient light in your room. It would be nice if you could better control the brightness but as long as I keep windows covered and keep lights off it’s beautiful. As I mentioned, it’s over 7 foot wide image so that with good resolution is the wow factor for this projector.Overall I’m thrilled, however, it is annoying that I have to reset the projector every single time I turn it on. I can’t permanently mount it high because every time I start it, the keystone is off and the size is off (even if the menu says it’s at 85% it’s not, it’s at 100%) and to correct this I have to turn the projector to a side wall, allow it to reset keystone and focus and THEN turn it back to my screen to do the process again. And even then, I often have to do this more than once and unfortunately 90% of the time, the adjustment in the menu are unresponsive. I select screen size and nothing changes, I select keystone manual adjustments and nothing happens. Every 10th time I try this it might work but mostly it doesn’t. It could be the lag is too great and my patience is too short…but this is a problem I thought would be corrected by the version update. It was bad enough that I am still considering the idea of returning it. The only reason I haven’t is that I doubt I will find a projector with the other features at this price so I’m just playing the game and doing the dance to get it fine tuned the way it should be. Overall I’m still very pleased with image and sound quality and you can’t beat the size!

reviews.reviewText: Muy buen artículo, pensaba comprarme un televisor de 65’, pero esto es mucho mejor y más barato, el parlante incorporado se escucha muy bien

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected
reviews.reviewText: Pretty bright and a lot of flexibility with keystoning. Note if you have a king bed and want to use it on the ceiling, you won't be able to center the image unless you put it on a shelf centered above the headboard.
